test_cases.name: Store settlement and position balances before fx transfer and normal transfer

meta.info: Store settlement and position balances before fx transfer and normal transfer

requests.description: store balances for fxp

assertions.description: Response code is 200

requests.description: store balances for fx payer

assertions.description: Response code is 200

requests.description: store balances for fx payee

assertions.description: Response code is 200

requests.description: Add Participant to ALS

assertions.description: Response status to be 202

requests.description: Get party info

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback body should contain party
Callback FSPIOP-Destination same as request FSPIOP-Source
Callback partyIdInfo (partyIdType, partyIdentifier)

requests.description: POST /fxQuotes

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback body should contain conversionTerms
Callback sourceAmount (amount & currency) to match the request
Callback content-type to be fxQuotes
Callback body should contain condition
Callback body should contain target amount
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request Copy

requests.description: POST /quotes

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback body should contain transferAmount
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request
Request transactionType scenario to be TRANSFER
Request transactionType initiator to be PAYER
Request transactionType initiatorType to be CONSUMER

requests.description: POST /fxTransfers

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback length not zero

requests.description: Check balances for Payer AFTER fx transfer

assertions.description: Payer position account value should be changed by the amount of the transfer
Payer settlement account value should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP AFTER fx transfer

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account value should not be changed
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not be changed
FXP Target currency position account value should not be changed
FXP Target currency settlement account value should not be changed

exec: console.log(`FXP Source Currency Position Balance after FX Transfer=${environment.fxpSourceCurrencyPositionAccountBalanceAfterFxTransfer}`);
console.log(`FXP Source Currency Settlement Balance after FX Transfer=${environment.fxpSourceCurrencySettlementAccountBalanceAfterFxTransfer}`);
console.log(`FXP Target Currency Position Balance after FX Transfer=${environment.fxpTargetCurrencyPositionAccountBalanceAfterFxTransfer}`);
console.log(`FXP Target Currency Settlement Balance after FX Transfer=${environment.fxpTargetCurrencySettlementAccountBalanceAfterFxTransfer}`);

requests.description: Check balances for Payee AFTER fx transfer

assertions.description: Payee position account value should not be changed
Payee settlement account value should not be changed

requests.description: Check that State of Fx Transfer is RESERVED

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback conversionState to be RESERVED
Callback content-type to be fxTransfers
Callback body should contain fulfilment

requests.description: POST /transfer

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback transferState to be COMMITTED
Request FSP source the same as quote callback FSP destination

requests.description: Check balances for Payer AFTER transfer

assertions.description: Payeer position account balance should not be changed
Payeer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after transfer

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account value should decrease by the source amount of the transfer
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not change
FXP Target currency position account value should increase by the target amount of the transfer
FXP Target currency settlement account value should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after transfer

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should decrease by the target amount of the transfer
Payee settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Check that State of Fx Transfer is COMMITTED

assertions.description: Response status to be 202
Response statusText be Accepted
Callback Content Length not 0
Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback conversionState to be COMMITTED
Callback content-type to be fxTransfers
Callback body should contain fulfilment

test_cases.name: Create Settlement and check balances at different stages

meta.info: Create Settlement and check balances at different stages

requests.description: Get Existing Open Window

assertions.description: Response status to be 200
State should be OPEN

requests.description: Close existent window

assertions.description: Status code is 200 or 400
New window State should be OPEN
exec: expect(response.body.errorInformation.errorDescription).to.eql('Generic validation error - Window ' + environment.openWindowID + ' is empty');

requests.description: Create Settlement for Closed Window

assertions.description: Status code is 200
Settlement State should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Number of associated windows should be 1
Associated Settlement Window ID is the correct one
Associated Settlement Window state should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Total Position across all accounts in the Settlement should be 0

requests.description: Check balances for Payer AFTER creating settlement

assertions.description: Payeer position account balance should not be changed
Payeer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after create settlement

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account value should increase by the source amount of the transfer
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not change
FXP Target currency position account value should not change
FXP Target currency settlement account value should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after create settlement

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should not be changed
Payee settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Prepare Settlement

assertions.description: Response code status is 200
Overall state is PS_TRANSFERS_RECORDED
Settlement Window state is PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Participants state is PS_TRANSFERS_RECORDED

requests.description: Check balances for Payer account after preparing settlement

assertions.description: Payer position account balance should not be changed
Payer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after prepare settlement

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position balance should not change
FXP Source currency settlement account balance should not change
FXP Target currency position account balance should not change
FXP Target currency settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after prepare settlement

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should not change
Payee settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Reserve Settlement

assertions.description: Response code status is 200
Overall state is PS_TRANSFERS_RESERVED
Settlement Window state is PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Participants state is PS_TRANSFERS_RESERVED

requests.description: Check balances for Payer account after reserve settlement

assertions.description: Payer position account balance should not be changed
Payer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after reserve settlement

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account balance should reset to value before transfer
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not change
FXP Target currency position account balance should not change
FXP Target currency settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after reserve settlement

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should reset to valaue before transfer
Payee settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Commit Settlement

assertions.description: Response code status is 200
Overall state is PS_TRANSFERS_COMMITTED
Settlement Window state is PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Participants state is PS_TRANSFERS_COMMITTED

requests.description: Check balances for Payer account after commit settlement

assertions.description: Payer position account balance should reset to value before transfer
Payer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after commit settlement

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account balance should not change
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not change
FXP Target currency position account value should be reset to value before transfer
FXP Target currency settlement account value should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after commit settlement

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should not change
Payee settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Settle Settlement

assertions.description: Response code status is 200
Overall state is SETTLED
Settlement Window state is SETTLED
Participants state is SETTLED

requests.description: Check balances for Payer account after settle settlement

assertions.description: Payer position account balance should not be changed
Payer settlement account balance should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP after commit settlement

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account balance should not change
FXP Source currency settlement account balance should not change
FXP Target currency position account balance should not change
FXP Target currency settlement account balance should not change

requests.description: Check balances for Payee after commit settlement

assertions.description: Payee position account balance should not change
Payee position should be changed
